TheHunted:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
TheHunted:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

TheHunted:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
TheHunted:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
TheHunted:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

TheHunted:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
TheHunted:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

TheHunted:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
TheHunted:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !TheHunted:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

TheHunted:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
TheHunted:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !TheHunted:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
